evidence: Repository contains multiple cohesive modules (e.g., clustering, linear_algebra, machine_learning) with clear boundaries
Each module appears self-contained with related functionality grouped together
Low package count (3) with moderate fan-out (4.5) suggests modular organization without microservices
No clear separation of ports/adapters indicating non-hexagonal architecture
Absence of web framework patterns suggests non-MVC structure
Presence of data processing and analysis modules indicates domain-focused organization
risks: Tight coupling between modules may develop over time without clear interface contracts
Lack of explicit architectural enforcement may lead to structural decay
Testing boundaries between modules may become complex
